subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets are looking for help at catcher and still need to determine what they are going to do with R. A. Dickey, their Cy Young Award-winning knuckleballer.
snippet: The Mets are looking for help at catcher and still need to determine what they are going to do with R. A. Dickey, their Cy Young Award-winning knuckleballer.
